title: Apple's (AAPL) "Buy" Rating Reaffirmed at Rosenblatt Securities
content: Rosenblatt Securities reissued a "buy" rating and set a $263.00 price target on shares of Apple in a research note on Thursday.

title: Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) Price Target Raised to $300.00 at Tigress Financial
content: Tigress Financial increased their target price on shares of Apple from $295.00 to $300.00 and gave the stock a "strong-buy" rating in a report on Thursday.
